title: Manage Sample Dispatch to Lab
description: A geology technician prepares a batch of drill samples to be shipped from the mine site to an external laboratory for analysis.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all the samples to be included in the shipment.
Create a dispatch form in the system, which includes the manifest and the shipping details.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal dispatch request is created.

tasks.description: Package the samples and the paperwork and hand them over to the logistics contractor for shipping. Track the shipment until it is received by the lab.
tasks.expected_outcome: The samples are shipped, and their chain of custody is tracked.
